resources.string: Please reboot to apply changes.\nQuick Circle Themes can try to apply the changes without a reboot. Pleas keep in mind that this feature is highly experimental and may cause instabilities. If you encounter any Problems please reboot.
No Watchfaces installed\nUse the import button to import new watchfaces
Zip file doesn\'t contain a clock.xml
Error reading file or file is not a zip file
A replaced file is not present in the zip

The theme you\'ve imported seems to be for the device %1$s, but your device seems to be a %2$s. Please note that themes for the wrong device won\'t work. If this is an error, please contact the author of the theme to fix it.
